Container.Name: ARK6-Valguero_P
Container.Overview:
This Docker will download and install SteamCMD. It will also install ARK:SurvivalEvolved and run it (Normal server startup of ARK can take a long time!).
ATTENTION: First Startup can take very long since it downloads the gameserver files!
Update Notice: Simply restart the container if a newer version of the game is available.
You can also run multiple servers with only one SteamCMD directory!

Config.Name: SteamCMD
Config.Description: Container Path: /serverdata/steamcmd

Config.Name: ServerFiles
Config.Description: Container Path: /serverdata/serverfiles

Config.Name: Steam-Username
Config.Description: Your Steam username goes here if you want to install a game that needs a valid account, otherwise leave it blank (ATTENTION: You have to disable Steam Guard).

Config.Name: Validate Installation
Config.Description: Set the Variable to 'true' if you want to validate the installation otherwise leave it blank.

Config.Name: Steam-Password
Config.Description: Your Steam password goes here if you want to install a game that needs a valid account, otherwise leave it blank (ATTENTION: You have to disable Steam Guard).

Config.Name: Map
Config.Description: Container Variable: MAP

Config.Name: Server Name
Config.Description: Leave empty if you want to use the settings from GameUserSettings.ini (this field accepts no spaces)

Config.Name: Server Password
Config.Description: Leave empty if you want to use the settings from GameUserSettings.ini (this field accepts no spaces)

Config.Name: Server Admin Password
Config.Description: Leave empty if you want to use the settings from GameUserSettings.ini (this field accepts no spaces)

Config.Name: Game Parameters
Config.Description: Enter your game parameters seperated with ? and start with a ? (don't put spaces in between eg: ?MaxPlayers=40?FastDecayUnsnappedCoreStructures=true)

Config.Name: Extra Game Parameters
Config.Description: Type in your Extra Game Parameters seperated with a space and - (eg: -DisableDeathSpectator -UseBattlEye)

Config.Name: UDP 1
Config.Description: Container Port: 7787

Config.Name: UDP 2
Config.Description: Container Port: 7788

Config.Name: UDPSteam
Config.Description: Container Port: 27020

Config.Name: TCPRCON
Config.Description: Container Port: 27030

Config.Name: ClusterID
Config.Description: Name of the cluster this ARK should be a part of. Requires the ClusterFlies host path of all ARKs to be the same so they can pass player files back and forth.

Config.Name: ARK Save and Configs
Config.Description: container Path: /serverdata/serverfiles/ShooterGame/Saved A segregated space for separating ARK saves and config ini's when creating a cluster example: /mnt/cache/appdata/ark-se/ARK1-TheIsland

Config.Name: UID
Config.Description: Container Variable: UID

Config.Name: GID
Config.Description: Container Variable: GID

Config.Name: GAME_ID
Config.Description: The GAME_ID that the container download at startup. (https://developer.valvesoftware.com/wiki/Dedicated_Servers_List)
